definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 誰讓你起得這麼晚，整個赤血宮就你這個時辰才起牀。

sentences.english: So every book catalog has a title card.
sentences.chinese: 這麼說，目錄櫃中每本書都有一張書名卡。

sentences.english: Don't do this on an old, slow machine.
sentences.chinese: 不要在速度慢的舊機器上這麼做。

sentences.english: As you can tell, she is STILL in heavy demand even after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 即使這麼多年後，楊紫瓊仍然片約不斷。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃羅一定有個行得通的方案，否則他不會這麼幹。

sentences.english: So there's real possibility of one of them existing without the other.
sentences.chinese: 這麼一來它們就真得有可能獨立存在了。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要寫出一封精彩的求職信遠沒有這麼簡單。

sentences.english: There a large number of things for us to see a new goodd study in this well site.
sentences.chinese: 在這個井場有這麼多我們要看和研習的東西。

sentences.english: Maybe some newsy remembers an odd customer.
sentences.chinese: 也許哪個賣報的還記得這麼個古怪的顧客。

sentences.english: Do you have ants in your pants? = Why are you fidgeting so much?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼這麼坐立不安？

sentences.english: Ihope I didn't wake you up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我盼願這麼早沒有吵到你。

sentences.english: But the amounts they have put on the table have been small.
sentences.chinese: 但是在桌面上提出來的價格是這麼少。

sentences.english: I only know that it happened because at some stage I awoke.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道有這麼回事，因爲在這個過程中我曾經醒過。

sentences.english: Spending such a large number of companies is how to design costs?
sentences.chinese: 多支出這麼大的設計費公司內是怎麼討論的呢？

sentences.english: It is the customer's responsibility to close out hedges if they wish to do so.
sentences.chinese: 這是客戶的責任來將鎖單平倉，如果他們願意這麼做。

sentences.english: But his wife Cao Jingyun was opposed.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妻子曹靜雲卻反對這麼做。

definition: like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
